author: bjtpro
title: A Great Dump Truck
review: There wasn't a review of this so I thought I'd give it a go?  It's a pretty straight-forward Duplo item, the truck is only two parts, the dumper is removeable (but it doesn't come off really easily which is nice).  It's very sturdy. If I had to find something to criticize it would be that the wrench doesn't really have any purpose and it's way out of scale.  Also, the minifig is the same as contained in at least one other set, the Stone Quarry.  This dump truck is a nice complement to the Quarry as it's a pretty sizeable truck and holds alot of bricks.  My toddler really likes the little traffic cone included as well.
